properties.name: Barcelona
properties.description: Posted by Mc3Barcelona, SpainMark came to visit me and we started our trip in Barcelona. We saw a lot of cool stuff and ate a lot of terrible food. My favorite part were the parks we went to, Montjuic and Parc Guell. And our hotel was awesome and we made some great memories there.

properties.name: Bay Ridge, Brooklyn
properties.description: Posted by Mc38009 3rd Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11209Mark drives a long and terrible ride to come visit me and Muffin here. He\'s always a good sport with doing whatever Marissa and I want to do, even if that means hour subway rides to go out in "the city." He makes the Pour House a lot more fun than it should be. And he makes sitting around on the couch a lot more fun than it should be too... And seeing him play with my kitten makes me very happy.

properties.name: Boston
properties.description: Posted by Mc3Boston, MAMark drove me to Boston for a real Fourth of July experience to see the best fireworks in the world. It was really nice to be in the city that means to much to Mark and to spend the day on a blanket together.

properties.name: Cape Cod
properties.description: Posted by Mc3Some of my favorite times have been in Harwich and Denis with Mark. From hot nights in lifeguard chairs, to seeing a gopher waving at me in his yard, I\'ve always had a good time here.

properties.name: London
properties.description: Posted by Mc3London, EnglandMark visited me here for Spring Break and it was really special to share my experience with him. It was very hard for me to experience a new city and not have Mark there to enjoy it with me, so it meant a lot that he came. My favorite part was when we went to the top of St. Paul\'s Cathedral together even though we were scared. And London was also the place where Mark gave me one of my favorite presents ever, the bracelet that means so much to me.

properties.name: Milwaukee
properties.description: Posted by Mc35523 N. Shoreland Ave., Whitefish Bay, WI 53217Summers of 2003 and 2004. We went to Summerfest, the zoo, the art museum, the beach, the revolving restaurant and celebrated the 4th of July together.

properties.name: New Orleans
properties.description: Posted by Mc3New Orleans, LATraveled from Syracuse to New Orleans with Josh for 22 hours in a car to see Cuse win the NCAA Championship. It was an opportunity I probably wouldn\'t have taken advantage of myself if it hadn\'t been for Mark. And while we were in the car at a gas station we looked at eachother and said "i love you" at the same time. That was neat.

properties.name: New York City
properties.description: Posted by Mc3new York, NYSometimes we go out in Manhattan, and it\'s usually not very fun, but because Mark is there I always have a good time.

properties.name: Newport Beach
properties.description: Posted by Mc3  Newport Beach, CAWe traveled here for Spring Break 2006. Even though we weren\'t together, my favorite part of break was being around Mark and getting to sleep in the same bed with him again. It meant a lot to me to see that he still cared about me like I cared about him.

properties.name: Niagara Falls
properties.description: Posted by Mc3niagara fallsWe drove here for our two year anniversary and had a very special, romantic time in a fancy hotel overlooking the falls. It was really exciting to do something like go on a trip alone together, and I remember being thankful that I had a boyfriend who was so nice to want to do that kind of thing with me.

properties.name: Syracuse - Freshman Year
properties.description: Posted by Mc3Mark and I met on "the mount" the first week of college. We had our first kiss in my dorm room on September 13, 2002. I wasn\'t expecting to meet anyone so soon, but I\'d never met someone who I was so instantly comfortable with and so attracted to. I\'d also never expected to meet someone so caring and romantic on top of all the other things (like funny, smart and hot) that I was looking for in a guy. From making me macaroni in a non-existent kitchen for Valentine\'s Day to being so patient with me as our relationship advanced, he was more than I could have asked for in a boyfriend. We had a year with a lot of great memories.

properties.name: Syracuse - Junior Year
properties.description: Posted by Mc3810 Livingston Ave., Syracuse, NYThe first semester of Junior year was hard knowing that I\'d be gone second semester. But Mark made me feel loved and special, and he planned the most romantic anniversary with breakfast, roses and our trip to Niagara Falls. Junior year was fun because we finally had a nice big bed to sleep in, even if we took advantage of my dorm bed more often for the FUN stuff.

properties.name: Syracuse - Senior Year
properties.description: Posted by Mc3718 Livingston, Syracuse, NYMark lived here Senior year. We had lots of fun cuddling Milton, playing Burnout, sleeping a foot away from the ceiling and eating peanut butter crackers and drinking tea.

properties.name: Syracuse - Sophomore Year
properties.description: Posted by Mc3303 Stadium Place, Syracuse, NYMark and I lived in Lawrinson Hall sophomore year, far away from the rest of Syracuse civilization. I think we grew and matured a lot here after our first year together. We were pretty much all alone in Lawrinson, and it made me realize that Mark was all I needed to make me happy. And that year proved to me that this was the real thing.

properties.name: Venice
properties.description: Posted by Mc3Venice, ItalyMark came to visit me and we traveled to Venice for the most amazing and romantic week of my life. My favorite part was the Gondola ride we went on, it was like a movie. We also had incredible meals that were well worth getting lost in Venice for. It was so nice to reconnect with my man here after being apart for a whole semester, I felt so close to him and so loved. I\'ll always remember those trips.
